name: Play in the Dark - for kids
description: Search for BabyBus for even more free panda games for you to try!   It is normal for children to be afraid of the dark. They fear what they cant see in a mass of darkness. Make them feel more comfortable to the dark. Let our app give them an exciting night and have fun with creating different shadows. Darkness can be very pleasant!  Fun features: - Easy gameplay and lively scenes  - Make clever shadows and shades - Be very brave and save the night!  Find Kiki in his bedroom and explore all the dark spaces. You will be delighted to find the little mysteries hidden in his room. It will be a very special night!  About BabyBus  At BabyBus, we dedicate ourselves to sparking kids creativity, imagination and curiosity,and designing our products through the kids perspective to help them explore the world on their own.   Now BabyBus offers a wide variety of products, videos and other educational content for over 250 million fans from ages 0-8 around the world! We have produced more than 150 childrens educational games, 700 childrens songs, and animations of various themes spanning the arts, health, and science.   Contact us: ser@babybus.com Visit us: http://www.babybus.com
